Package bytemusketeers.heslingtonhustle.scene

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Drawable
    A Drawable represents a Disposable that may be rendered to a SpriteBatch
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Area
    An Area is a single room or outdoor scene in which the player can exist, containing its own TiledMap texture and set of Interactable objects.
    AreaFactory
    The AreaFactory provides a non-static factory for initialising particular Area objects, populated with Interactable objects
    Character
    The Character class represents the avatar of the player in the game, extending the Sprite.
    GameMap
    A GameMap represents and manages the Drawable playing Area background, principally consisting of the TiledMap.
    Interactable
    An Interactable is an Item with which the Character may interact.
    Item
    An Item denotes a drawable non-Character object.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Area.Name
    Distinguishes between the standard Area instantiations
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    InvalidAreaException
    An InvalidAreaException indicates that an Area could not properly be loaded
